name: isocurve

params.description: API key for services call (isocurve and autocomplete services), mandatory if autoconf service has not been charged in advance
params.name: options.apiKey

params.description: use of ssl or not (default true, service requested using https protocol)
params.name: options.ssl

params.description: Specify if widget has to be collapsed (true) or not (false) on map loading. Default is true.
params.name: options.collapsed

params.description: list of exclusions with status (true = checked), by default : ["toll":false, "tunnel":false, "bridge":false].
params.name: options.exclusions

params.description: list of graph resources to be used for isocurve calculation, by default : ["Voiture", "Pieton"]. The first element is selected.
params.name: options.graphs

params.description: list of methods, by default : ["time", "distance"]. The first element is selected by default.
params.name: options.methods

params.description:
list of directions to be displayed, by default : ["departure", "arrival"]. The first element is selected by default.
     Directions enable to specify if input location point will be used as a departure point ("departure") or as an arrival point ("arrival")
params.name: options.directions

params.description: whether to enable/disable the reverse geocoding
params.name: options.disableReverse
